column4: hi - just moved to 7.10 on an opteron box, and one of my processors has disappeared - is this going to be just a case of using the wrong kernel?
Change it to -generic or -server (if thats what you were using before)
what - by chaging grub.conf and reboting?
no, remove linux-i386 and install linux-generic
or just install -generic if you want to play it safe
yessir, those are the names of the packages.
i already seem to have linux-generic - so is it just a case of booting to that kernel?
Looks like it, If that doesnt work, remove it and re-install it
pdfcrack, its in the repos, never used it myself.
